entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 2 major bugs with autocompletion with razor editor in visual studio 2022 #36125
  • Wrong diagnostic reported in nested nested C#/HTML scenarios #36124
    17.0-Preview5
  • Smart indent can fail in HTML nested in C# scenarios #36123
    17.0-Preview5
  • Option to use old razor editor for visual studio 2022 #36121
  • Render Fragments Under Visual Studio 2022 Not Showing Up Under Intellisense #36120
  • Snippets don't work in Razor Editor #36117
  • PageTitle component breaks in .NET 6 RC1 Blazor Server after hot reload #36116
  • Startup improvement: plaintext #36106
  • An item with the same key has already been added. Key: Content-Language when using UseRequestLocalization and UseStatusCodePagesWithReExecute #36105
  • CheckPasswordAsync throws The input is not a valid Base-64 string #36096
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis disposing connections while in use #36092
  • Find if session is expired with HttpContext #36090
    Discussions
  • Performance issue on for / loop in Blazor WASM #36095
  • JSON Patch - remove operation by index appears to throw JsonPatchException (... is out of bounds of the array size) despite not appearing to be out of bounds #36089
  • Control browserlink port or disable aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js #36085
  • Startup regression: fortunes_dapper, plaintext #36083
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_ef #36082
  • Perf improvement: mvc #36081
  • Quarantine WebHostFunctionalTests.LoggingConfigurationSectionPassedToLoggerByDefault #36079
  • Code generation for setting Blazor component parameters #36071
    7.0-preview1

Closed

  • UseDeveloperExceptionPage plain-text response should set charset #35954
    6.0-rc2
  • ASP.NET Core and SPAs in .NET 6 #27887
    6.0.0
  • Package Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.EntityFrameworkCore 5.0.0 is not compatible with net50 (.NETFramework,Version=v5.0). Package Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.EntityFrameworkCore 5.0.0 supports: netstandard2.1 (.NETStandard,Version=v2.1) #35552
  • RequestDelegateFactory should return "415 Unsupported Media Type" response when parameter binding and the request isn't JSON #35856
    6.0-rc2
  • RequestDelegateFactory should throw BadHttpRequestException when in development to make diagnosing handler issues easier #35858
    6.0-rc2
  • Unable to provide a global custom ErrorBoundary by subclassing the existing `ErrorBoundary` class #35504
    6.0-rc2
  • Hot reload 6.0.0-preview.3.21201.4 Blazor WASM + ASP.Net Core Hosted partially works #32993
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #36045
  • AddJwtBearer middleware support for JWKS without discovery document #36016
  • Windows Emoji + Blazor *.razor file #27664
  • Responsive flex layout is not working in Blazor Virtualize #35700
    Backlog
  • .NET 6, Preview 7: Setting title in WASM App #35973
    6.0-rc2
  • Blazor - BrotliCompress msbuild task duplicate processing of files - causes lock exceptions #29529
  • "C# 10(preview) + ASP.NET Core Web App (.NET 6.0) + AppendTargetFrameworkToOutputPath=False" produce compilation error #36039
  • PersonalDataAttribute does not specify AttributeUsage. #32833
    .NET 7-Candidate
  • How to use Html.DisplayFor correctly ? #35991
  • [Perf] SoD Regression in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web.dll #34736
    6.0-rc2
  • Strange dotnet watch output when editing files from VS2022 #35340
    6.0-rc2
  • Clean up dotnet watch output on rude edit #35341
    6.0-rc2
  • WSL2: running the app using dotnet watch and then pressing "Ctrl + Shift + R" doesn't do anything when in windows terminal or in the VS Code terminal #34478
    6.0-rc2
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, .NET 6, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 6, aspnetcore #aspnetcore-106070-.NET6 #36075
  • Single file build time improvement: plaintext #35963
  • Perf regression: json_actix #36013
  • DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware should set response status code from BadHttpRequestException #35857
    6.0-rc2
  • Improve RoleManager documentation #32005
    6.0.0
  • VS 2022 Preview 3.1 Template creates Minimal API for Blazor Server Hosted Project #35577
  • Upload CSV File in Blazor hast the wron Format of German "Umlaute" #35653
  • In-app IHostingStartup instances are not discovered/run when --applicationName is passed via args to WebApplication.CreateBuilder, e.g. from test projects #35956
    6.0-rc2
  • Ambiguous Map method with Minimal #35323

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Blazor Server Reconnection Mechanism #36126
    area-signalr, area-blazor
  • Run user defined hosted services before the server starts. #36122
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Properly reject non-json FromBody parameter binding #36118
    area-runtime
  • Update gitattributes to fix bootstrap CDN SRI #36115
  • Add nullable support to BindAsync #36114
  • Avoid using static NullabilityInfoContext #36112
  • [release/6.0] Create .rpm's for Linux Mariner #36111
    area-infrastructure
  • New Hosted build pools #36110
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] HTTP/3: Support canceling requests that aren't reading a body #36109
    area-runtime
  • Update ChromeDriver version #36107
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Program.cs #36103
    area-mvc
  • Store and reuse health status for health checks #36102
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Retarget DOTNETHOME when installing x64 on ARM64 #36100
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Fix root '<PageTitle>' not working when a default, static '<title>' is provided #36099
    area-blazor
  • Create .rpm's for Linux Mariner #36094
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Update npm dependencies #36088
    area-blazor
  • [SignalR] Add Http options to Negotiate metadata #36078
    area-signalr
  • Add code generation for setting Blazor component parameters #36074
    area-blazor, area-razor.compiler
  • Remove UseRouting from templates #36069
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Properly reject non-json FromBody parameter binding #35976
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Throw for bad requests intended for minimal route handlers in development #36072
    area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • HTTP/3: Support canceling requests that aren't reading a body #36017
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix frame type exception message in Http3InMemory #36005
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix root '<PageTitle>' not working when a default, static '<title>' is provided #35982
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine `LoggingConfigurationSectionPassedToLoggerByDefault` #36080
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • PersonalDataAttribute should only apply to properties #36067
    breaking-change, area-identity, 7.0-preview1
  • Throw for bad requests intended for minimal route handlers in development #36004
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Backport Fix issues with hosting startups #36076
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Fix null-ref for MSAL WASM Auth #36056
    area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Add myself to more CODEOWNERS areas #36073
    7.0-preview1
  • Add support for WithTags extension method (#35672) #36026
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix issues with hosting startups #36055
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Log time-taken more precisely #36066
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2

Updated

  • Add minimal option to webapi template #36068
    area-mvc
  • Add support for stating accepts/consumes metadata is required or not #35875
    area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • Improve error messages for missing body and services #36064
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • [WIP] Bootstrap v4 support #35981
    area-identity
  • Add Win11 helix-matrix/quarantine queue, remove win7/8 #36040
    area-infrastructure
  • Use ArrayPool as default pool fallback #35719
    area-runtime
  • Use GetEndpoint extension method #35886
    area-mvc, area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Added support for Int64 and DateTime #35855
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Support platforms where crossgen2 is not available #35916
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Static web assets] Fix casing issues during parsing #35564
    area-mvc
  • Avoid pinning JSInterop code when unused #36036
    area-blazor
  • Warn that UseStartup/Configure/ConfigureWebHost not supported on WebApplicationBuilder #35884
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • WIP: Strongly-typed SignalR hub proxies and callback handlers #33717
    area-signalr, api-suggestion, community-contribution
